      • RestoreProtocol

        public RestoreProtocol(java.lang.String filepath,
                       FileInfo fileInfo,
                       boolean found)
        Runs a RESTORE protocol procedure with specified filepath.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the file path to restore
        fileInfo - the object containing info about the file
        found - whether the file was initiated on this Peer
